div.bibl: THE PHILIPPINE MESSENGER, Vol. II, No. 12, July 21, 1935"F. A. C. Passed A Resolution for ReOrganization"

body.p: During the last regular meeting of the F. A. C., at the Fraternity House, 16 E. Ontario Street, the members passed a resolution to revise the constitution of the association to meet present changing conditions. Basilio de Vera, the author of the Resolution, was appointed chairman of the Revision Committee.
